Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Gunnison
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lawrence, Central, Montrose, and Austin, due to, street blockage, near Austin/Gunnison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Lawrence, Central, Montrose, and Austin, due to, street blockage, near Austin/Gunnison.

Allow extra travel time.
